thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Stuart Swanson
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Stuart Swanson

author: Stuart Swanson
title: Stuart Swanson
text: I ordered the bass guitar kit to build and finish it on my own. I was amazed at how quickly the box arrived from TOMTOP (a few days) with everything as advertised. However, there were no instructions on how to put the thing together. So I emailed support asking for their help. They immediately sent back a PDF of instructions which, unfortunately, was printed in Chinese. I was able to go on google and get the PDF translated enough that it was usable, although not as complete as I would have liked. But, overall, I am very pleased with the results of my dealing with TOMTOP and have no reservations at all.
